title: Some MSI liquid coolers arenâ€™t working as intended, and you can get a replacement
content:
MSI has acknowledged an issue affecting the MAG CORELIQUID 240R and 360R V2 liquid coolers, and it’s offering free replacements for those affected. Any customer who owns one of these cooling solutions can easily apply for a replacement if their unit isn’t doing its job properly. The MSI MAG CORELIQUID R series is an all-in-one

The post Some MSI liquid coolers aren’t working as intended, and you can get a replacement appeared first on xda-developers.
description: MSI has announced it's making it easier to get a replacement for a couple of liquid coolers that may fail to work as intended.
